items.summary: Create a new StudentDashboard component that serves as a future placeholder section with header 'Student Dashboard (Coming Soon!)' and subtitle 'Access your personalized learning portal' with bilingual support (English and Bengali)

Display three feature cards in the StudentDashboard component showing 'Login System' (secure student authentication with Internet Identity), 'Notes & Test Results' (view downloadable notes and track test performance), and 'Attendance Record' (monitor class attendance and participation) with icons and descriptions
Add a 'Coming Soon' badge or status indicator to the StudentDashboard section to clearly communicate that this feature is in development and not yet available
Integrate the StudentDashboard component into App.tsx after the Contact section and before the Footer, maintaining component flow and styling consistency

Create backend data models in main.mo for future student dashboard functionality including Student record (id, name, class, enrollmentDate), TestResult record (studentId, subject, testDate, score, maxScore), and AttendanceRecord (studentId, date, present, notes)

Add placeholder CRUD function signatures in main.mo for student dashboard operations: createStudent, getStudent, addTestResult, getStudentTestResults, recordAttendance, and getStudentAttendance, with function bodies commented out and marked as 'Future implementation'
